title: If each of the One Direction members were a flavor, what would each person be and why (I mean with their solo careers)? - Quora

response.answer_text: for some reason i chose ice cream flavours. liam would probabbly be something like vanilla or chocolate, pretty basic but still great. zayn would be salty caramel, not everyone likes it? louis - cookies and cream, something you're just unable to hate. harry - some exotic fruit (maybe pineapple or watermelon?), colorful & sweet. niall - rum & raisins. not sure why, he just gives me that vibe. might have something to do with the fact that he's irish.
I don’t know about anyone else but Harry is definitely watermelon.
